thread.title: Florida survivor rallies for gun law reform

title: Florida survivor rallies for gun law reform
text:
Florida survivor rallies for gun law reform   01:12 
Florida shooting survivor Emma Gonzalez called for tougher gun laws during a rally in Fort Lauderdale, saying 'to every politician who is taking donations from the NRA, shame on you.' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Florida shooting survivor Emma Gonzalez called for tougher gun laws during a rally in Fort Lauderdale, saying 'to every politician who is taking donations from the NRA, shame on you.'
